allow.comment: We allow administrators to access the SafeSquid Interface from any IP
We allow administrators to access the SafeSquid Interface from any IP
Allow slave proxy servers in the cluster to sync policies. IP addresses of slave Proxy Instances: 192.168.2.116,192.168.2.117

All authenticated users not added to any specific user group are placed in the "GENERAL_USERS" user group. GENERAL_USERS are permitted to access the web as per policies, but not permitted to access the SafeSquid Interface

refresh.comment: This default rule is for refreshing the cache time intervals.

clamav.comment: Scan all contents of ANTIVIRUS profile.

deny.comment: Strip cookies from all connections profiled as READ ONLY

DLP.comment: We forbid all the users from uploading any kind of contents to any website
We Allow Users to Upload Textual Content.
Allow Uploading of ZIP Files [only .zip files]
Allow Uploading of Image Files [only images/.* files]
Block Upload of Documents[word, excel, ppt & pdf for the below listed profile
We Prohibit uploading of PDF Files

policy.comment: We block DNS requests for all websites categorized as Child Abuse Images,Nudity,Pornography/Sexually Explicit,Sex Education.
We block DNS requests for all websites categorized as Alcohol & Tobacco,Criminal Activity,Cults,Gambling,Hate & Intolerance,Illegal Drug,School Cheating,Tasteless,Violence,Weapons,games
policy.bl_categories: Alcohol & Tobacco,Criminal Activity,Cults,Gambling,Games,Hate & Intolerance,Illegal Drug,Peer-to-Peer,School Cheating,Tasteless,Violence

policy.comment: We block DNS requests for all websites categorized as Anonymizers, Botnets, Compromised, Hacking Illegal Software, Malware, Peer-to-Peer, Phishing & Fraud, Spam Sites
We prohibit access to malicious websites reported by our security apparatus
We Block DNS queries for websites Geo-Located in China

ELEVATED.comment: Prevent Targeted attacks from by preventing cookie exchange, hide referrer, and user-agent

forward.comment: Forward all requests to upstream proxy 192.168.250.141:8080

general.comment: Default policy and applicable for all cases. Our Default policy is to prohibit all Connect requests except to ports 80,443,2000 to 2100, 8080, and 9000 to 10000
Default policy and applicable for all cases. Our Default policy is to prohibit all Connect requests except to ports 80,443.

insert.comment: We require users to login to Google with only our corporate domains - our_domain.com, our_domain.net, and our_domain.org
We require users to login to Microsoft Office 365 with only our corporate domains id
We require users to login to Microsoft Office 365 with only our corporate domains id
Restrict loading of cross-site URLs using script interfaces.
Restrict web-page from triggering popups, or any plugins, scripts, cross-orgin traffic, etc. and prevent users to make any form submissions or downloads.
insert.value: default-src 'none'; form-action 'none'; font-src *; child-src 'none'; img-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; report-uri https://safesquid.cfg/csp?CLIENTID=@CLIENTID@&USERNAME=@USERNAME@

default-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; plugin-types 'none'; form-action 'none' frame-ancestors 'none'; navigate-to 'none'; block-all-mixed-content; upgrade-insecure-requests; report-uri https://safesquid.cfg/csp?CLIENTID=@CLIENTID@&USERNAME=@USERNAME@;

icap.comment: Send requests to ClamAV ICAP server REQMOD
Send responses to ClamAV ICAP server RESPMOD

imgfilter.comment: High Sensitivity Policy for aggressive detection of Pornographic Images
Standard Policy for detecting Pornographic Images

ldapsection.comment: Integrating Microsoft AD Server: 10.200.2.53 for Kerberos(SSO) based user authentication.

limit.comment: Accessing the internet with speed of 500kbps

listen.comment: We require SSL inspection for HTTPS traffic transparently redirected to port 8443.

interface.comment: For connections with profile "ALTERNATE OUTBOUND IP", route outgoing traffic via secondary ISP using IP "192.168.1.200"

defaults.comment: We permit only minimal content access for Advertisements & Pop-Ups, unclassified websites to prevent any Phishing attack
We want to bypass user authentication for applications that do not supports proxy authentication
We enforce SafeSearch for users accessing Google Search.
We enforce SafeSearch for users accessing Yahoo Search.
We enforce SafeSearch for users accessing Bing Search.
We enforce SafeSearch for users accessing duckduckgo Search.
We enforce Restrict mode for users accessing YouTube.
defaults.add_profiles: ENFORCE YOUTUBE RESTRICTED MODE,FULL CONTENT ACCESS

defaults.comment: We forbid use of personal Google accounts, and allow use of only our Corporate Google account
We forbid use of personal Google accounts, and allow use of only our Corporate Google account
We bypass HTTPS Inspection for applications that work only when SSL Inspection is disabled
We Permit access to our Intranet Web Sites that use self-signed certificates
We allow all youtube videos which are educational content
We prohibit downloads of exe file for all users

profile.comment: Facilitate seamless access for websites needed for daily business
We want to scan for all Post data send to wetransfer
Block everything else apart from web contents
Enforce CSP Sandbox for Homograph Domains

redirection.comment: Redirect the bing unsafe mode to safe mode.
Enforces the google safe search by Redirect unsafe google search request to safe google search request.
redirection.profiles: ENFORCE GOOGLE SAFE SEARCH,ENFORCE YOUTUBE SAFESEARCH

redirection.comment: This entry enforces the Yahoo safe search by Redirect unsafe google search request to safe Yahoo search request.
This entry enforces the DuckDuckGo Safe Searching Experience

request_hosts.comment: Malicious websites reported by our security apparatus
Web Sites needed for daily business

response_section.comment: Responses that browsers would generally require user to save to the desktop as some file
All Textual Contents [Few Content Specified in the Below Content-Type Field are used by Major web Applications to send status etc information to communicate with the Client-Side JS ]

All the content that is not rendered on the WebBrowser. Whereas PDF files are displayed on web browsers but that is browsers feature to download and work as PDF Viewer.The Browser first downloads the PDF file and then it will render it directly [Depends on the type of Ajax Call OR Response]
All web response which has Content Security Policy.

https_scan.comment: Bypass inspection of SSL/TLS encrypted traffic. Tunnel Non-Browser applications to remote web servers. Facilitate use of Client side SSL certificates for Digital Signature.
Allow traffic to websites with self-signed certificates.
Bypass SSL errors for incomplete certificate chain due to missing issuer certificates.
https_scan.profiles: BYPASS NO ISSUER CERT LOCALLY ERROR

https_scan.comment: Our Default policy for HTTPS Inspection applies to all connections that do not match the above profiles

template.comment: Default template displayed , when the there is no access to internet or any websites are blocked.
template.name: blocked

template.comment: Default template displayed , when the there is no access to internet or any websites are blocked.
template.name: error

time_section.comment: Our Office Timing is Monday to Saturday 9.30AM to 5.30PM
Our Lunch Timings are 1:00 PM to 2:00 PM

WCCP.comment: Transparently redirect traffic to WCCP router.

rewrite.comment: Request for png image instead of avif, required for image filter for image scanning.
Request for jpg image instead of webp, required for image filter for image scanning.
